top_questions.text: Debug the following program. [3] REM to print 5 records from data file HOSPITAL.TXT​ OPEN "HOSPITAL.TXT" FOR APPEND AS #5​ FOR REP = 1 TO 5​ INPUT #3, PN$,AD$,G$,A​ DISPLAY PN$,AD$,A, G$​ NEXT REP​ FINISH #5​ END

Read the following program and answer the given questions. [2] DECLARE SUB AA (N$)​ CLS​ W$= "CYBERCRIME"​ CALL AA(W$)​ END SUB AA (N$)​ R= LEN(N$)\2​ E$=RIGHT$(N$,R) + LEFT$(N$,R)​ PRINT E$​ END SUB Questions:
Write a program using C language to input an integer then check whether the integer is negative or positive or zero. [2]
Write a program using C language to print the first 25 odd numbers between 50 to 100. [2]
Write the technical term for the following statements. [2×1=2]
